an5.223:1.3: Bahubhando hoti bahubhandasannicayo, bahubhesajjo hoti bahubhesajjasannicayo, bahukicco hoti bahukaraniyo byatto kinkaraniyesu, samsattho viharati gahatthapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisamsaggena, tamha ca avasa pakkamanto sapekkho pakkamati.
an5.223:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava atinivase.
an5.223:2.3: Na bahubhando hoti na bahubhandasannicayo, na bahubhesajjo hoti na bahubhesajjasannicayo, na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraniyo na byatto kinkaraniyesu, asamsattho viharati gahatthapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisamsaggena, tamha ca avasa pakkamanto anapekkho pakkamati.
an5.223:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa samavatthavase”ti.
